name: StormySoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open stormy sounds”
”Alexa ask stormy sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stormy sounds
des: A storm is a brewing! Get to shelter and listen to this stormy soundscape from the comfort of your home. Get started by saying, 'Alexa, open Stormy Sounds,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
